{"id":"68350159-cca2-4aae-9fc4-e3d775de89f8","name":"Navigation XML fragment class not found errors","timestamp":1761772238773,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

<current_file>
```xml:app/src/main/res/navigation/nav_graph.xml, lines=ALL(1-28)
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<navigation xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:id="@+id/nav_graph"
 app:startDestination="@id/homeFragment">

 <fragment
 android:id="@+id/homeFragment"
 android:name="com.zen.videoplayertestapp.HomeFragment"
 android:label="fragment_home"
 tools:layout="@layout/fragment_home" />
 <fragment
 android:id="@+id/videoRendringFragment"
 android:name="com.zen.videoplayertestapp.VideoRendringFragment"
 android:label="fragment_video_rendring"
 tools:layout="@layout/fragment_video_rendring" />
 <fragment
 android:id="@+id/videoInfoFragment"
 android:name="com.zen.videoplayertestapp.VideoInfoFragment"
 android:label="fragment_video_info"
 tools:layout="@layout/fragment_video_info" />
 <fragment
 android:id="@+id/allCollectionsFragment"
 android:name="com.zen.videoplayertestapp.ui.fragments.AllCollectionsFragment"
 android:label="fragment_all_collections"
 tools:layout="@layout/fragment_all_collections" />
</navigation>
```
</current_file>

1. **Conflicting Material Design versions**: The build.gradle.kts has both `libs.material` (version 1.13.0) and a hardcoded `"com.google.android.material:material:1.0.0"`
2. **Conflicting Navigation versions**: Using both version catalog navigation (2.9.5) and hardcoded navigation (2.3.5)
3. **Conflicting Coroutines versions**: Multiple versions of kotlinx-coroutines
4. **Old ExoPlayer version**: Version 2.16.0 is quite old and may have compatibility issues"}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01E6SPV7TyVkUJyrYqnyzwQe","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/build.gradle.kts", "instructions": "I will clean
```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/zen/videoplayertestapp/MainActivity.kt, lines=ALL(1-30)
package com.zen.videoplayertestapp

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.core.view.ViewCompat
import androidx.core.view.WindowInsetsCompat
import androidx.navigation.NavController
import androidx.navigation.fragment.findNavController

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
 private lateinit var navController: NavController
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)
 viewCompat()
 // Initialize NavController
 navController = childFragmentManager.findFragmentById(R.id.NavHostFragment)
 ?.findNavController() ?: throw IllegalStateException("NavHostFragment not found")
 
 }
 fun viewCompat(){
 ViewCompat.setOnApplyWindowInsetsListener(findViewById(R.id.main)) { v, insets ->
 val systemBars = insets.getInsets(WindowInsetsCompat.Type.systemBars())
 v.setPadding(systemBars.left, systemBars.top, systemBars.right, systemBars.bottom)
 insets
 }
 }
}
```
</current_file>
